name: LOW BATTERY (miniignis)
description:
LOW BATTERY

CONTROLS:

DPAD / ARROW KEYSMOVEDPAD UP / UP ARROWENTER DOORA  /  ZJUMPB  /  XINTERACT / ENTER LEVEL

NOTES:

  • If you're having trouble entering a level, you have to be facing upwards while on top of it or facing it. Apologies!
  • GBSTUDIO is a neat tool! My first time both using it and making "music" for a game!
  • If there are any other errors with the game, please send me feedback! :)
  • Have fun!

CREDITS:

  • Art, Music, Etc. by MINIIGNIS (me!)
  • Play Tested by Family (not a username, just my actual family)
